name: Don't Sleep (Biawanna)
description:
Welcome to the nightmare world of "Don't Sleep," an adventure puzzle horror game that will challenge your wits and your nerves as you try to escape from a world of darkness and terror. 

As you awaken in this surreal realm, you soon realize that you're not alone. Strange and terrifying monsters are lurking in the shadows, and you must use all your skills to avoid them and navigate through the obstacles that stand in your way. 

The first level of "Don't Sleep" is filled with treacherous challenges, including falling crosses that threaten to crush you, and pools of rising blood that threaten to drown you. You'll need to think on your feet to avoid these obstacles and find a way out of this nightmare world. 

As you explore further, you'll uncover clues and hints that will help you to solve the puzzles and unravel the secrets of this mysterious realm. But be careful - the monsters are always lurking, ready to pounce on you at any moment. 

Can you survive this first level and make it one step closer to freedom? The fate of your sanity is in your hands.

controls:

select - left mouse

move - wasd

run - shift

jump - space

pause - escape
